Package com.sg.flooringmastery.dao

Interface FlooringMasteryDao

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FlooringMasteryDaoFileImpl
    public interface FlooringMasteryDao
    Author:
    raymondtam

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Order addStudent​(String studentId, Order student)
      Adds the given Student to the roster and associates it with the given student id.
      List<Order> getAllStudents()
      Returns a List of all Students on the roster.
      Order getStudent​(String studentId)
      Returns the student object associated with the given student id.
      Order removeStudent​(String studentId)
      Removes from the roster the student associated with the given id.

    • Method Detail

      • addStudent

        Order addStudent​(String studentId,
                 Order student)
          throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Adds the given Student to the roster and associates it with the given student id. If there is already a student associated with the given student id it will return that student object, otherwise it will return null.
        Parameters:
        studentId - id with which student is to be associated
        student - student to be added to the roster
        Returns:
        the Student object previously associated with the given student id if it exists, null otherwise
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • getAllStudents

        List<Order> getAllStudents()
                    throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Returns a List of all Students on the roster.
        Returns:
        Student List containing all students on the roster.
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • getStudent

        Order getStudent​(String studentId)
          throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Returns the student object associated with the given student id. Returns null if no such student exists
        Parameters:
        studentId - ID of the student to retrieve
        Returns:
        the Student object associated with the given student id, null if no such student exists
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException

      • removeStudent

        Order removeStudent​(String studentId)
             throws FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
        Removes from the roster the student associated with the given id. Returns the student object that is being removed or null if there is no student associated with the given id
        Parameters:
        studentId - id of student to be removed
        Returns:
        Student object that was removed or null if no student was associated with the given student id
        Throws:
        FlooringMasteryPersistenceException
